mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Turkish Empire in Europe, Asia and Africa divided into all its governments : together with the other territories that are tributary to it, as also the dominions of ye Emperor of Marocco ; according to the newest and most exact observations
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Moll, Herman, -1732
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 60 x 101 cm. on sheet 63 x 107 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed for H. Moll over against Devereux Court in ye Strand, and Iohn Bowles at the Black Horse in Cornhill, and T. Bowles Print & Mapseller next to the Chapter house in St. Pauls Church Yard, and Iohn King at the Globe in the Poultry
